scenario_text.value: What is it, Takuma?

Everyone’s acting all tense. What happened
while I was gone?
...Um, well... Let’s say it’s been a lot.

(Sounds like it’s something he doesn’t really
want to talk about.)
Well, the important thing is, you’re back!
We have hope again, all thanks to you!

What do you think, Takuma?
Has Minoru toughened up a bit?
Aw, come on, Falcomon!
I speak the truth, no need to be bashful.

Hold up, you’re talking like a parent fawning
over their baby boy!

If it hurts your feelings I’ll relent.
It was simply my honest opinion.
Why I oughta...

(He’s definitely gotten stronger. He can act
so cheerful without putting up a front.)

(It feels more like something he’s always had
inside of him has risen to the surface.)

(From what I can tell, Falcomon’s done some
growing of his own, too.)
(What should I say about it?)
Minoru’s shaped up!
He’s the same guy.
Falcomon’s changed.
Minoru’s shaped up!
I think you’ve shaped up a bit too, Minoru.
Sheesh, not you too, man! Give me a break!

I mean, instead of mouthing off the way you
usually do, you seem somehow more cheerful...

But it doesn’t feel forced, I guess? I’m
happy to see you acting like yourself.
Oh, uh, you think? Heh, well... Thanks, dude.

Hmph, it seems you understand my boy well,
Takuma.
Who the heck said I’m your boy, man?!
He’s the same guy.
Hmm, hasn’t Minoru always been this way?
Oh? How do you figure?

You always seem to mouth off, but you were
just saying what’s on your mind.

It’s like the good stuff that was always
inside you’s come to the surface now.
Um, that IS a compliment, right?
Of course.
High praise, indeed!

For real? Heheh... You’re making me blush,
here.

Even I could discern that much, Takuma. I’ve
become a bit of an expert on our boy, here.

Aw c’mon, it’s like a competition to
embarrass me!
Falcomon’s changed.

If you think Minoru’s changed, I’d say it’s
because you’ve changed too, Falcomon.
Me? Whatever do you mean?

You realized Minoru’s good points... Or it’s
more like you learned to praise them.

And Minoru accepted you without question,
too. That’s proof that you trust each other.

Hrmm... I hadn’t thought of it that way. I’ve
grown too, have I?
I’d say so!

Keep shoveling the praise on! I’m a flower
that needs watering, baby.
Hmph, I do believe you’re backsliding...
Heheh, such an odd couple, those guys!

(These two look like they’re getting along
just fine...)

Well, don’t worry about us. Whatever comes
along, we got this!
